name: 投资模拟器：打工人
description:
Publisher's e_mail: publish@youxibd.com
Developer's e_mail: steve_an@163.com

The idea of this game comes from the cash flow game of "Poor Dad rich Dad". The part of the game is aimed at the players who have not started their own business, how to find investment information through contacts or media, select investment projects that can bring positive cash flow, obtain investment income, and realize the financial freedom of workers.





You need to identify the direction of your future business in advance so that you can improve the relevant attributes accordingly.





Investment is not your father to give you 500 million, players through the workplace to make money, improve their daily income, reduce their daily expenses, so that their cash flow is positive, add up, investment rolls, so as to achieve the wealth accumulation of interest.



In addition to working, you can also take a variety of part-time jobs, such as writing, typist, game training and so on, you can also set up stalls to exercise their sales ability, so that they become a sales master





You can also go to Macau to play Russian roulette to try your luck, or challenge boxing to win money, to build up your body, the better you are, the more resilient you are





You also look for investment institutions, network with investors, and get angel funding





Of course, life is not just about making money. The essence of loving life is to enjoy life. You can play with your dog, pet your cat, watch movies, read books, etc., to enrich your life and make your life tasteful.



Home is the harbor of life, your marriage is always that mom don't forget to think, urging marriage, marriage, blind date is something you have to face.

You will meet all kinds of girls, gold digger, help brother devil, silly white sweet, white rich beauty and so on, suitable for you, only you know





In addition to love and affection, you also need friendship, classmates and friends are your companions on the road of life, there are six levels of interpersonal relationships in the game, money is flowing, friends are moving, and more communication with friends.





Most importantly, you must fulfill the task your father gave you, or you have to follow your father back home to farm.

In short, this is a cash flow game, but also a life simulator, I hope you have fun!
